name: 王賢達
objective: 內容包括高分子聚合反應，高分子結構及其物理性質。並包含高分子物性的鑑定及高分子流變學和加工。另就橡膠、塑膠、纖維，由結構、性質、用途、產品，做比較和說明。
schedule:
1. Introduction to polymer science(1 wk)
2. Polymer structure(morphology)(2 wks)
3. Molecular weight of polymers(2 wks)
4. Step-reaction polymerization or polycondensation reactions(2 wks)
5. Mid-term exam(1 wk)
6. Ionic chain-reaction and complex coordinative polymerization
(addition polymerization)(3 wks)
7. Free radical chain polymerization(addition polymerization)(3 wks)
8. Copolymerization(1 wks)
9. Final exam(1 wk)
scorePolicy:
Homework and attendance(30%)
Mid-term exam(30%)
Final exam(40%)
materials: Polymer Chemistry (Charles E. Carraher, Jr.) 7th ed.
